text: I don t really have any hope leftI ve made too many posts here but I m sure they ve been forgotten so I suppose I should preface this by saying that I m a trans woman and I suffer from depression  anxiety and dysphoria  I m on meds for depression and anxiety and I ve been on hormone replacement therapy for about five months and I see a therapist   I ve been under a lot of stress lately because of all of that and money issues too  My family is stressed out as well so they can t really support me at all  I guess that wouldn t be a problem for a normal  year old  but I m not very independent and I struggle to take care of my responsibilities  I use to be kinda hopeful about my future but during the past week I feel like I ve hit rock bottom again  I ve been drinking a lot and I started taking drugs again  although unfortunately they re relatively harmless  I ve been really stressed out because I m always broke  I ve been so upset by my voice being so masculine  despite the effort I ve made to change it  that I actively avoid talking to anyone I used to be kinda hopeful when confronting some of these problems  I tried to kill myself a couple times during the past few years and I thought that that was a thing of the past  But I ve got some drugs that I m pretty sure would be fatal because of the antidepressants I take  I want to take them  maybe today or tomorrow  I don t have any hope  I don t feel like I m in control of my own life  I m alone  but I m too afraid to meet people  I m too afraid to seek any more help  I m afraid of death but I feel like living the rest of my life is the worse option  And I hate myself so much

text: Losing Hope EverydayMy mother is emotionally cold after being left   times in her life  twice of which while I have been alive  I have moved schools towns against my will for the past   years  yearly  I still miss my past love to death  whom I pushed away through selfish young actions at age   I turn   next month  I am about to begin University  But still  I am so empty  I have never had a father connect to me  I have never had a tender mother  I have lost many friends to the pace of life  I don t even want to question why it seems people love to let me disappear  because that is just more I can not  really none of us can   solve  I have no true passions  and I rely largely on weed to patch my mood  which living in an illegal state  isn t always possible  I just want relief from the pain in my chest  I want direction  I want to give someone my energy  I want peace of mind  and I want redemption  I want to wake up everyday knowing what the fuck I am supposed to be doing in this life  But alas  all I see is a sunrise and a sunset  Superficial hoops that we must jump through on this journey  which simply determine how comfortably we rest our heads when the time comes  Shits bleak and I want to cease to exist  The only thing stopping me is my mother  as she s the only one left for me  I just need to hear something  maybe from those of you a bit further down the road than me  I ve tried so hard to stay strong  but at this point I feel like I m WAITING for myself to get worse  in hopes that one day I ll have the courage to send myself somewhere I ll find peace
